body_html:
Currently, when viewing a recipe, the breadcrumbs display as Home/View Recipe, when it should actually display as Home/Recipe Listing/View Recipe.

This is happening as a result of the change to trailing slashes in our URLs. Take this router snippet for example:

'/recipe': {
  '/': {
    component: RecipeListing,
    crumb: 'Recipes Listing',
  },
  '/new': {
    '/': {
      component: CreateRecipePage,
      crumb: 'New Recipe',
    },
  },
  ...
}

Say the user is on /recipe/new/. The breadcrumbs add a crumb for New Recipe, move up a parent, find there isn't a crumb on /new, skips it, doesn't find a crumb on /recipe, and continues to move on until there is a crumb to display.

There are a few options, but I think the crumbs need to smartly identify if there is an entry for '/' and if there is a breadcrumb attached to it.
title: Breadcrumbs not showing items
